E12: Motors starting.; Flight mode changed to P-GPS.
E6: Data Recorder File Index is 80.; Set Return to Home (RTH) altitude to 100 m (328 ft).; Set maximum flight altitude to 500 m (1640 ft).; Flight mode changed to Starting Motors.
E8: Flight mode changed to Manual Takeoff.
E2: Adjust antennas and make sure they are perpendicular to flight direction of aircraft.
E9: RC signal lost.; Aircraft braking.; Image transmission signal weak.
E3: Auto landing in progress.; Make sure the area under the aircraft is safe for landing.
E10: Push throttle down to use force landing.
